an10.123:4.1: “Mendicants, these ten things are not purified and cleansed apart from the Holy One’s training.
an10.123:4.3: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.123:4.4: These ten things are not purified and cleansed apart from the Holy One’s training.”
